description.narrative: This project is intended to provide the NMB Merger Committee with the guidance of advisory firm Enclude and local consultant BEED. The project team will advise on a clear path for the successful launch of a new entity through a high level merger plan. By providing guidance on strategy, culture, organizational structure, governance, and regulation, this project will facilitate a smooth and successful merger between the banks involved.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands

description.narrative: An activity that contains sub-activities (sub-components) which are reported separately to IATI
